staff.name: Karam
staff.statement: Karam is the Founder of United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. Karam started the server in September, 2023 and has been been running it since.

staff.name: Sami
staff.statement: Sami is the Second Founder of United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. Sami has been in the server in November 2nd, 2024 and has been been working here since.

staff.name: Faheem
staff.statement: Faheem is one of the Co Founders here in United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. Faheem was first in the server during February 2024 then later retired in June 2024. Faheem made a return in November 15th 2025 in goal to help Sami whilst Karam was on LOA.

staff.name: Not_L4nd
staff.statement: Land is one of the Co Founders here at United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. Land made an entrance around the beggining of 2025 and has been here since.

staff.name: Fynnandelias
staff.statement: Fynn is one of the Assistant Founders here at United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. Fynn made an entrance in XX of XX. Fynn has loved every hour of being here.

staff.name: James
staff.statement: James is one of the Assistant Founders here at United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay. James an entrance in XX of XX. James has enjoyed it.

staff.name: Mcrunner
staff.statement: Joshua (McRunner) has been in here for a very long time so we will not mention when he joined, though he loves United Kingdom: Birmingham Roleplay.

staff.name: Josh L
staff.statement: Josh has been in United Kingdom: Birmingham Rolplay for a few months. He is an assistant founder here aswell as a developer.
